title: Lag on Sever and I get Ranked Lose
body: Was trying to play a ranked match. Your servers lagged out, Told me i didn't pick my ban: and then I was once again at the ranked start screen with a 5 mins timers. Bans were already over, I was about to pick my champ and lock him in. FAIL. There should be something to help protect someone against this. Since I'm in my promo, trying my best to get out of Bronze. AJSDAIOJDFIOGJSKLJSDGFKLJSDF

replies.body: Was first time, yesterday. I think the servers were acting up cause someone else said something about the lag. Just frustrating. Almost out of Bronze and i take a hit from the server. So teams are bad enough. :P Just venting i guess.

Absolutely been there before, and I fully agree with the "AJSDAIOJDFIOGJSKLJSDGFKLJSDF" (my keyboard is a champ for putting up with me).  Is this something that happens to you fairly consistently?  Or was this the first and only time you encountered something like this?

Give me a heads up and let me know!
